SEARCH
Package hospital.io

Class JsonHandler

java.lang.Object
hospital.io.JsonHandler
public class JsonHandler extends Object
The JsonHandler class provides methods to import and export data from and to JSON files.

    • importMap

      public static collections.graphs.Network<Room> importMap(Hospital hospital, String filename) throws FileNotFoundException, ImportException
      Imports map data as form of edges from a JSON file and adds the edges to the hospital.
      Parameters:
      hospital - The hospital where you'll be importing
      filename - The name of the file to import
      Returns:
      The network of the hospital
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If it not finds the file
      ImportException - If there is an error reading the file or parsing the JSON content
